quest.name: Village of Woe
journal:
 Quest Sync
Eueliss appears to have been awaiting your arrival.

Recognizing you as Alphinaud's traveling companion, Eueliss requests that you provide her an escort to the nearby Stonegazer. Find her on the path north of the village, and be prepared to fend off any aggressive wildlife.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
You have dispatched the threat on the path to Stonegazer. It seems, however, that Eueliss could use a hand getting to her feet...
Eueliss recovers quickly and continues on her way. At this pace, you will soon arrive at Stonegazer.

Once at Stonegazer, Eueliss addresses a man by the name of Sai-Lewq, who appears to be a close friend of her father. It seems she would surrender to him the role of mayor, but Sai-Lewq refuses to consider the proposal unless Eueliss completes for him a number of tasks. The first of these tasks─the acquisition of a sickle─takes you back to the village of Wright...

Returned to the village once more, Eueliss soon comes into possession of the requested sickle. The suddenly tense exchange between her and a villager, however, leads her to explain more of the incident which befell the people of Wright the year before─a tragedy which culminated in her father taking his own life. A determined Eueliss nevertheless bids you accompany her back to Stonegazer and Sai-Lewq.
Eueliss hands the sickle to her father's friend, but is obviously distressed by Sai-Lewq's stubborn refusal of reality. She thanks you again for the escort, and your continued presence at her side.
objectives: Head north of Wright and slay any monsters that threaten Eueliss.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Excuse me, but you're the ladygentleman Alphinaud was traveling with, aren't you? I'm sorry, I didn't quite catch your name...

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename, how lovely to meet you! My name is Eueliss, and I'm the acting village mayor. I was hoping someone of your talents would pass through Wright before long...

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: The thing is, I need to visit someone up at Stonegazer, but I'm afraid to walk the path alone. Do you think you could provide an escort?

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: My thanks. I just couldn't bring myself to ask one of the villagers...

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: You see, there was an incident a while back where a veteran band of hunters was badly mauled.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Simply mentioning that it's unsafe to wander outside the village these days would be enough to bring back memories of that grisly scene─which is why it's been so difficult to even bring up the subject.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: But such does not change the fact that the roads are indeed dangerous. Pray meet me on the path to the north, and be prepared to fend off the wildlife.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: What did I tell you! I was barely ten steps out of the village... Come, let us hurry along before more predators have a chance to gather!

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Thank you for the escort, Forename. This is the gentleman I wished to speak with, so we needn't go any further.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Sai-Lewq...

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Are you wandering around by yourself out here? You know what kind of creatures lurk beyond the borders of the village...

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: ...Ah, well if it isn't Cliftol's little girl. Something I can do for you, lass?

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Yes, sir. I came for an answer to my proposal from the other day. Have you given any thought to taking over as village mayor?

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: I'm doing the best I can in the interim, but I have neither the age nor the wisdom to continue in the role. And the rest of the villagers agree with me.

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: ...I'm fairly sure I told you “nay” once already.

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: But seeing as you found a guard just so you could come and talk to me, then mayhap I will consider the idea...in exchange for a few small tasks.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: You will!? Please, just tell me what I need to do!

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: My friend, Cliftol─your dear father─was looking for a sickle to cut some rope. Would you mind skipping back to the village and borrowing one for me?

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Why would you─?

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: <cough> I mean, a sickle, was it? For cutting rope. That shouldn't be too difficult.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: I had only meant to ask you along for the one trip, but if I'm to complete these tasks... Would you be willing to indulge me a while longer?

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: <sigh>

dialogue.name: VILLAGER03371
dialogue.text: Good day to you, young Eueliss! ...You look a little flustered, dear. Was there something I could help you with?

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: And a good day to you, madam. I was actually hoping to borrow a sickle...

dialogue.name: VILLAGER03371
dialogue.text: Is that all? Here, you can take this one!

dialogue.name: VILLAGER03371
dialogue.text: I've several spares, so there's no rush in returning it. Doing a spot of harvesting, are you?

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: My thanks. But it's not for me, exactly─I was asked to bring one for my father...

dialogue.name: VILLAGER03371
dialogue.text: ...Your father!? Shadows save me!!!

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Forgive me. If you're to accompany me in these tasks, then you deserve to know the whole story.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: ...It was my father, Cliftol, who was the former mayor of Wright.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: And the “incident” I spoke of earlier was something that happened a year ago. One day, a stray sin eater came prowling around and slaughtered nearly half the village. It was a waking nightmare...

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Some of the villagers blamed my father─they said it was because he refused to accept the protection of Eulmore.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: The sheer scale of the tragedy and the accusations that followed wore away at his conscience, until finally, he could bear the guilt no longer...

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: He hanged himself.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Sai-Lewq, the old man we spoke to, was his closest friend. But considering how he worded his request, it seems he's reluctant to accept the fact of my father's death.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Still, I would see this task to its end. Let us bring him his sickle, shall we?

dialogue.name: VILLAGER03371
dialogue.text: Something I can do for you, dear?

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Sai-Lewq, sir, we've brought the sickle you asked for.

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: Oho! Good, good! Old Cliftol will be glad to see this!

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Oh, sir...

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Thank you for staying with me, Forename. This might be harder than I expected...

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: ...Did you bring it?
